name: Santa Doctor Christmas Salon - Little Spa Shave & Mommy Baby Xmas Games for Girl Kids
name_original: Santa Doctor Christmas Salon - Little Spa Shave & Mommy Baby Xmas Games for Girl Kids
description:
Can you help treat Santa & all of his Christmas friends?

Play Santa Doctor and have sooo much fun!!

Tons of characters:
- Santa
- Snowman
- Gingerbread Man
- Rudolph
- Elf
- Grinch!!
